project_description: The project generally consists of the construction of: a single story building consisting of 6 classrooms, restrooms, utility spaces and a large multipurpose space. Site work includes new asphalt play field, courts, solar installation, fire lane striping and modifications to fencing. Play structures and soft surface materials are owner furnished, contractor coordinated and installed along with minor landscaping. Project is on an active school site, all work will be coordinated with the District to cause the least disruption to class, particularly for special education programming.
activities_completed: Poured continuous footings at Grid A & B
Installed erosion control measures per SWPPP
Electrical conduit placement in slab area
critical_items: Awaiting RFI #012 response from HED Design re: footing depth at Grid 7
planned_activities: Form and pour stem walls Grid Lines 1-5
Install anchor bolts per structural plans
special_considerations: Concrete pump truck Tuesday AM - temporary parking impact
Coordinate with after-school program for safe walkway access
photo_captions: Erosion control protecting site during rain
commitment_text: Our construction team completed this week's activities with zero educational disruptions while maintaining the highest safety standards. Moving into higher-impact phases, we remain committed to advance communication, flexible scheduling around special programs, and immediate response to any campus concerns.
_comment_logos: Place logo files in same directory as generate_report.py
_comment_photos: Place up to 6 construction photos in same directory
